sampling 100 points from a log normal distribution
```{r}
mu<-1
sigma<-.25
x<-rlnorm(100,meanlog=mu, sdlog= sigma)
```

Histogramm of my sample
```{r}
hist(x)
```

Reporting mean and variance
```{r}
mean(x)
var(x)
```
